titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition of the Mishnah from Maimonides Autograph MS of the Commentary to the Mishnah
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 License.

note.p: Published as a sample text for a digital edition of the Mishnah, using Oxygen
From autograph copy of the Commentary of the Mishnah (Bodleian, Pococke 295). Images from Sassoon, Maimonidis Commentarius in Mischnam, 1956-1961.

w.note: So pointed by transcriber. But based on the image used for transcription, perhaps חָמֳשין
Following Mishnah follows immediately. Commentary appears in the left margin, with an insertion mark here.
Space for drawing in Maimonides's commentary.
Alternatively, last character is ו for יזיקו.
Space for drawing in Maimonides's commentary.

ab.w:
למא
Words עליו and למאה are rubbed out.

תחלה
Strikethrough repeated in citation in commentary.
